actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

official_title: To direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services to treat hospitals located in Henderson County, North Carolina, as being located in Buncombe County, North Carolina, under section 1886(d)(8)(B) of the Social Security Act.

summary.text: Treats hospitals located in Henderson County, North Carolina, as being located in Buncombe County, North Carolina, for Medicare payment purposes.

titles.title: To direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services to treat hospitals located in Henderson County, North Carolina, as being located in Buncombe County, North Carolina, under section 1886(d)(8)(B) of the Social Security Act.
